lines.text: The same night you designed the Titanic.

[to Al]
If you're bored in New Jersey, you're already retired.

[Talking about his daughter]
Tell her that I'm never leaving New Jersey again. Tell her I'm sorry they built the-the bridge and the tunnel.
You're a funny man, Al. A pain in the ass but a funny man.
Was it your idea to be sort of a straight man?
No, he just said the jokes before I could get them out.

[Entering the dining room]
Haven't been in the Friars' Club in years.
Yeah, until I die. Then I'll quit.
